Articles.Content:
K.R.A.S.S.H. Industries just uploaded Gladys, our entry for the Kerbal Express Airlines challenge and our 41st craft, to KerbalX.

This means our craft will be the 42nd, a significant number for anyone who knows anything about hitchhiking around the galaxy. While we have some developments in the pipeline, we thought we would honour the occasion by soliciting suggestions on what to build from the wider community.  Our specialty is offbeat craft, so peruse our selections and see if you can find a weird thing we have missed.  Suggestions will be incorporated into build 42!

The craft will be named Trillian and towels will be provided to all passengers.

https://kerbalx.com/Klapaucius/craft

Edited September 3, 2018 by Klapaucius
